\beginhymn Laudate nomen Domini.

\begingroup

\resetlayout

\def\notes{\vnotes2}%quavers
\def\Notes{\vnotes4}%minims
\def\NOtes{\vnotes6}%dotted minims
\def\NOTes{\vnotes8}%semibreves

\def\lati#1{\cchar{-7}{#1}}
\def\engl#1{\cchar{-12}{\itlyrics #1}}

\rmlyrics

\setclef1{\treble}
\smallmusicsize
%\belowsystem{8}
\generalmeter{\meterfrac22}
\startpiece
